forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 57. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 37. North northwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. Southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 41, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers after 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 26 overnight. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 8am, then a chance of freezing rain between 8am and 11am, then rain and a chance of freezing rain. Cloudy, with a high near 37. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 8pm, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms between 8pm and 10pm, then freezing rain and rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 30. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of freezing rain before 11am, then rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 39. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

forecast.name: Friday Night

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Conditions are very good. The upper trails have the best conditions.
nubsNob.comments: We are being blessed with another beautiful ski day in late March. The sun is out and the snow is in great shape. Expect a firmer snow in the morning that will soften up by mid-day. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
